title: Love in Tahiti
description: Set against the turquoise waters and golden sunsets of Tahiti, 'Love in Tahiti' follows Emma, a travel photographer escaping a broken engagement, and Kai, a local marine biologist devoted to protecting the coral reefs. When their worlds collide, they embark on a transformative journey of love, healing, and rediscovering the beauty of second chances.

title: Merry Christmas, Ted Cooper!
description: A heartwarming holiday comedy about Ted Cooper, a grumpy toy store manager whose Christmas spirit is reignited when a mysterious customer and a group of local kids remind him what the season is truly about.

title: Don't Log Off
description: During a virtual birthday party, a group of friends realizes one of them has gone missing. As they dig deeper, their video call turns into a race against time to uncover the truth before the connection drops forever.

title: Porcelain
description: A psychological drama about a celebrated sculptor whose latest masterpiece becomes an obsession that blurs the line between art and madness.

title: Silver, Speik and Sumpters
description: An eccentric team of inventors embarks on a steampunk adventure to recover a stolen energy core that could change the course of human history.

title: Psycho Ex
description: A dark romantic thriller about a woman whose seemingly perfect relationship turns deadly when her ex-boyfriend begins stalking her with disturbing precision.

title: Eleanor the Great
description: At 75, Eleanor decides to fulfill her lifelong dream of performing stand-up comedy. With the help of her granddaughter, she rediscovers joy, resilience, and the courage to take the stage.

title: Babo: The Haftbefehl Story
description: A gritty biographical drama tracing the rise of German rapper Haftbefehl from the streets of Offenbach to becoming a cultural icon in European hip-hop.

title: Meteor: Final Impact
description: A massive meteor is headed toward Earth, and a team of scientists must work against time and bureaucracy to avert global catastrophe.

title: The Cleaners
description: A group of content moderators for a social media giant begins to question the ethical and emotional toll of their work as they uncover disturbing truths hidden within the platform.
